Name: Battle Tanks: Arena
About the game: THE BATTLE BEGINS! Capture cities and destroy enemy tanks in breathtaking firefights. Protect your comrades from attacking enemies. To defeat a dangerous enemy, come up with a plan of action in advance to destroy as many enemies as possible with less loss... FEATURES: Beautiful graphics (in cartoon style) Realistic sounds Different tanks Different battle maps: Cities, Fields, Villages Team fight (Player + AI)
